article_text:
Easton, MD (21601)

Today

Sunshine and clouds mixed. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 86F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph..

Tonight

Some clouds. Low 66F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

article_metadata.author:
JACOB OWENS and MATT BUTLER
Special to The Star Democrat

og.description: ELKTON — The pool of candidates who filed in Maryland’s 1st Congressional District vying to unseat Republican Rep. Andy Harris is an assortment of familiar faces and newcomers.
og.title: Congressional candidates talk 1st District race
